name: YouTube (Classic) | Dark FADE (2020)
description:
The sought-after DARK FADE style for the classic YouTube interface

Actively maintained fork of the original.

Use the "Good Old YouTube" browser extension to switch back to classic YouTube.

Please submit any issues with the user style here for further discussion.
